attributes.notes:
## Amazing Experience!

Cyberpunk 2077 really delivered after all the updates. The story was incredible and Night City felt truly alive. The side quests were surprisingly deep.

**Highlights:**
- Main story: Absolutely fantastic
- Graphics: Stunning on high settings
- Gameplay: Combat felt smooth and satisfying
- Characters: Well-developed and memorable

**Minor Issues:**
- Still encountered a few bugs
- Some missions felt repetitive

Definitely recommend to any RPG fan!
